revised_title: The Formation and Development of Triradiate Spicules in Leucosolenia
tldr: The author investigates the formation and development of triradiate spicules in Leucosolenia, finding that they originate from the external flat epithelium and grow through the secretion of rays by specialized cells. The study supports the theory that sponges are two-layered animals and provides insights into the evolution of their skeletal structures.
